ai-tha-ap167:0.3_0: for the very monasteries and for the Elders made a dwelling place
ai-tha-ap167:1.2_0: for the sake of the world’s enjoying the benefit of the world.
ai-tha-ap167:2.1_0: after making a plate for him,
ai-tha-ap167:2.2_0: Having prepared a sunshade, this is the land.
ai-tha-ap167:2.3_0: I’ve prepared a beard of flowers
ai-tha-ap167:3.2_0: it was all over the flower.
ai-tha-ap167:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap167:4.1_0: I’m twenty years old, twenty, thirty,
ai-tha-ap167:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kaṇṭaka.
ai-tha-ap167:7.1_0: The fifth section for recitation on the heart
